mcq.statement: Who translated Allama Iqbal's books Zarab-e-Kalim and Payam-e-Mashriq into Arabic?
mcq.one_liner: The Arabic translations of Allama Iqbal's books Zarab-e-Kalim and Payam-e-Mashriq were completed by **Dr. Abdul Wahab Azzam**.

Muhammad Ali Jinnah and Muslim League (1913)
